title: Operation of a tunable Power over Fiber system for light detectors down to 4.6 K
summary: The Power over Fiber (PoF) technology delivers electrical power by transmitting laser light through a lightweight, non-conductive fiber optic cable to a remote photovoltaic optical converter, which in turn powers sensors or electrical devices.
